code: import{useRef,useEffect}from"react";export function useHorizontalScroll(){var elRef=useRef();useEffect(function(){var el=elRef.current;if(el){var onWheel=function onWheel(e){if(e.deltaY==0)return;e.preventDefault();el.scrollTo({left:el.scrollLeft+e.deltaY,behavior:"smooth"});};el.addEventListener("wheel",onWheel);return function(){return el.removeEventListener("wheel",onWheel);};}},[]);return elRef;}
